title: Dog Training Methods for Pulling on the Leash and Recall Training
headline: This free online course teaches you how to stop your dog from pulling on the leash and how to provide recall training.
description: Throughout this dog training course, you will learn how to communicate with your dog in a language they understand. Did you know that there are simple techniques that you can employ before leaving the house that can make a remarkable difference to your walk? Learn proven dog training methods that will get your dog to walk by your side and discover recall training techniques that ensure that your off leash pet comes back to you on command.
courseDescription:
For some dog owners, going on a walk can be a stressful event. Following the techniques in this course, you will learn how to have your dog walk nicely by your side and come back when called off leash, resulting in a more enjoyable walk. This course focuses on empowering you by presenting you with the tools, knowledge and dog training methods to use in order to have a pleasurable walk and is designed for any dog owner regardless of prior experience. Step-by-step video demonstrations that use ‘pack leader’ theory combined with positive reinforcement techniques will show you how to apply these techniques day-to-day with your pet.

Throughout the course, you will learn what to do before going out, which makes a remarkable difference to the walk. We provide simple solutions to prevent your dog pulling on the leash and even a 'miracle technique' that is rarely spoken about but works like magic to get your dog to walk calmly by your side. Also included in the course are dog training techniques that stop them from mouthing the leash and zig-zagging in front of you. We also explain how to get your off leash dog to come back when called.

By the end of this dog training course you'll have the dog training knowledge and confidence you need to make a positive difference to your walk. Discover how you can become your dog’s pack leader without shouting, hitting or using force. Imagine going on a walk where your dog walks happily by your side, responds favourably to your commands, comes back when called and wants to do as you say; this is what you can look forward to after completing this dog leash and recall training course.
